claim: Sister Act features musical arrangements by Marc Shaiman.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Marc Shaiman  (  born October 22 , 1959  )  is a Grammy , Emmy , Tony winning , and multi Oscar nominated American composer and lyricist for films , television , and theatre .

claim: Sister Act features musical arrangements by Marc Shaiman.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is perhaps best known for writing the music and co-writing the lyrics for the Broadway musical version of the John Waters film Hairspray .

claim: Sister Act features musical arrangements by Marc Shaiman.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Featuring musical arrangements by Marc Shaiman , the film stars Whoopi Goldberg as a Reno lounge singer who has been put under protective custody in a San Francisco convent of Poor Clares and has to pretend to be a nun when a mob boss puts her on his hit list .

claim: Sister Act features musical arrangements by Marc Shaiman.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is currently writing the screenplay for the Disney musical Mary Poppins Returns , directed by Rob Marshall , with music by Marc Shaiman and lyrics by Marc Shaiman and Scott Wittman .

claim: Sister Act features musical arrangements by Marc Shaiman.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2013 , Wittman and Marc Shaiman co-wrote the score for Bombshell , a musical about Marilyn Monroe within the context of the NBC television show Smash .
